    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(Series series,
                       ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Initializes the factory for the given series.

        For series with no loader, a list of available patches are created based on population settings. For series with a loader, the specified file is loaded into the factory.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface LocationFactory
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        random - the random number generator

      • loadLocations

        public void loadLocations​(Series series)
        Loads location containers into the factory container.

        Loaded locations are mapped by their id.

        Specified by:
        loadLocations in interface LocationFactory
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
